net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.input.keyboard

Interface KeyboardListener

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface KeyboardListener
    Interface to be used in conjunction with a State to handle Keyboard input.
    Since:
    March 8, 2015, 1:15:17 AM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void keyboardInput(Keyboard keyboard)
      Enables direct use of the Viewable's keyboard.
